page.title: 06Village Events
page.content: Every year Bramley has a fete in the Summer and lots of people go there to join in the games or to buy things from the stalls. The money goes to charity. It is held on the cricket field near Gosden House School and they also join in. This school is for children who have difficulty in learning. On the Saturday nearest to November 5th a firework display is put on in the village in the evening. This is great fun and the people who go also have a baked potato. The Bramley Players are a local amateur dramatic company and each year they put on a play.
